attributes.action: STOP ITV FROM COVERING ANY SPORT
attributes.additional_details:
ITV should be banned from covering any sport now and in the future. They have to rank as the worst broadcaster in the world for sport. here is the proof
Adrain Chiles - like watching paint that wont dry
Andy Townsend - I was searching for a red button that let me play vuvuzela something i thought I would never say in my life
Anything that involve 4 dull men in primark shorts on a beach talking rubbish I can go to Spain to do that.
They are just proper rubbish full stop.
GET THIS EVIL OFF OUR SCREENS
